text: The Gorani people live in different parts of the Balkan Mountains, especially in Kosovo. The language Gorani is a mix of Albanian language and Old Slavic languages. Their religion is Islam. In 1999, a mass circumcision was hold in Dragash for Gorani boys,. Dragash is one of the main settlements, the Gorani Men are well-known for Oil wrestling.https://www.unhcr.org/cgi- bin/texis/vtx/home/opendoc.pdf?tbl=SUBSITES&id;=412b0b674 == References == Category:Balkan Mountains Category:Muslims Category:Kosovo
title: Gorani people
